projects.title: BingusEats
projects.description: (Private Repository, please request access) Full Stack Wait Management System using a PERN stack in a team for a university capstone project. Functions similarly to Me&U with some novel functionalities such as menu versioning and a recommendation algorithm based on weather and food tags

projects.title: DungeonSlayer
projects.description: Developed with a team focusing on Object Oriented Design/Programming. Developement process with UML diagram and ER mapping can be found on the Github Repo

projects.title: Reel-Riddle
projects.description: A movie guessing game based on plot, year of release, and genres that resets daily with leaderboard functionality. Used the top 100 movies pulled from the TMDB API resetting every month using CRON. Find a link to the demo in the portfolio page of this website.

ec: Active Guitarist in High School Music events including Creative Arts Nights, Open Days, School Lunchtime Concerts, and 2014 and 2016 School Musicals (Apollo 14, Back to the 80s). Band A leader in 2016 Musical.
